short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send relevent match data from Challonge directly to your stream client for efficient tournaments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds tools to your challonge bracket page for use with teaCup's stream assist features. TeaCup for Challonge will allow users to queue matches to be played on stream, and with teaCup's web interface be able to modify custom titles for the current match.
